content: this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable pdf version of this crochet pattern the sandy sunset tote crochet pattern includes written instructions for making the sandy sunset tote and a video tutorial on my youtube channel when finished and laying flat this bag is approx 12 inches wide and 13 5 inches tall not including the handles this crochet pattern is easy to follow and intermediate-beginner friendly but still fun for more experienced crocheters i hope you enjoy making the sandy sunset tote materials this bag was made with light-weight #3 yarn but it also works well with any worsted-weight #4 cotton yarn you ll need approximately 350-375yds of yarn crochet hook 4 mm crochet hook or 5mm if using a worsted-weight yarn instead yarn needle - for weaving in ends you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose in whole or in part please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
